mapper.select: select id, code, name, pro_code, disease_code, oper_code, city_code, area_code, admin_name, admin_phone, buli_image_path, address, phone, fax, email, post_code, hosp_image_path, introduce, website, legal_name, legal_phone, level_code, pym, wbm, long_lat, start_date, end_date, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,encrypt_start_date,encrypt_end_date,access_ips from center_hospital where code = #{code}

select id, code, name, pro_code, disease_code, oper_code, city_code, area_code, admin_name, admin_phone, buli_image_path, address, phone, fax, email, post_code, hosp_image_path, introduce, website, legal_name, legal_phone, level_code, pym, wbm, long_lat, start_date, end_date, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from center_hospital where id = #{id}

select id, code, name, pro_code, city_code, area_code, disease_code, oper_code, buli_image_path, address, phone, fax, email, post_code, hosp_image_path, introduce, website, legal_name, legal_phone, admin_name, admin_phone, level_code, pym, wbm, long_lat, start_date, end_date, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from center_hospital
( name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or pym like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or wbm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and NOT ((end_date <= #{start_time}) OR (#{end_time} <start_date))
and is_valid = '1'
order by crte_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into center_hospital(id, code, name, pro_code, city_code, area_code, buli_image_path, address, phone, fax, email, post_code, hosp_image_path, introduce, website, legal_name, legal_phone, admin_name, admin_phone, level_code, pym, wbm, long_lat, start_date, end_date, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, disease_code, oper_code) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{proCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{buliImagePath}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{postCode}, #{hospImagePath}, #{introduce}, #{website}, #{legalName}, #{legalPhone}, #{adminName}, #{adminPhone}, #{levelCode}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{longLat}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, '1', #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{diseaseCode}, #{operCode})
